Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Phakathi kuzona zombili kunezithelo nezihlahla zamasundu namahalananda (uhlobo lwesithelo esinezinhlamvu eziningi)
Ngakho-ke yikuphi komusa weNkosi yenu nobabili (abantu namajinn) enikuphikayo
Ngakho-ke yikuphi komusa weNkosi yenu nobabili (abantu namajinn) enikuphikayo
Ngakho-ke yikuphi komusa weNkosi yenu nobabili (abantu namajinn) enikuphikayo
(Abesifazane) abangakaze bathintwe ngabantu ngaphambilini kwabo futhi abangakaze (bathintwe amajinn)
Ngakho-ke yikuphi komusa weNkosi yenu nobabili (abantu namajinn) enikuphikayo
Becambalele emaphilweni aluhlaza kanye nakokhaphethi abahle
Ngakho-ke yikuphi komusa weNkosi yenu nobabili (abantu namajinn) enikuphikayo
Alibusiswe igama leNkosi yakho umnikazi wobukhosi, kanye nodumo. likaMvelinqangi onomusa onesihawu
Manjalo	abangane	bangakwesokudla,	yini	abangane bangakwesokudla
Kanye	nabangane	bangakwesobunxele,	yini	abangane bangakwesobunxele
Nabedlulelayo	(ekwenzeni	izenzo	ezinhle	kulomhlaba) bangabedlulelayo (empilweni ezayo)
